inclusion.criterion: Diagnosis of osteochondritis dissecans or focal articular cartilage defects as confirmed by x-ray or MRI
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Localized scaling and maceration between the third and fourth of his right toe
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Non-confirmed diagnosis (i.e. patient does not yet have imaging confirmation)
exclusion.label: does_not_trigger

notes: Patient has itchy foot with localized scaling and maceration, confirmed by KOH wet mount examination.
